title: Dragon's Eastern Gaze - Father's Connection to Son
theoryText: After Ivankov's revelation that Dragon always faced east toward the East Blue, fans theorized that Dragon maintained an awareness of and connection to Luffy despite never meeting him. This behavior suggests Dragon may have been keeping tabs on Luffy's progress from afar, possibly even influencing events to protect him.
author: One Piece Community Discussion
notes: This theory emerged from episode 441's revelation about Dragon's behavior. Later episodes confirm Dragon's awareness of Luffy, though the full extent of his involvement remains unclear.

title: Revolutionary Army's Strategic Placement in Impel Down
theoryText: Some fans theorized that Ivankov and Inazuma's imprisonment in Impel Down may not have been accidental. Instead, they may have allowed themselves to be captured to create a secret base (Level 5.5) that could be used for a future prison break or to free important prisoners. The creation of New Kama Land and the subsequent mass breakout lends credence to this theory.
author: One Piece Community Discussion
notes: While intriguing, this theory was essentially debunked as Ivankov's capture appears to have been genuine, though they made the best of their situation by creating Level 5.5.

title: Emporio Tension Hormone's Long-term Consequences
theoryText: Following the debut of the Emporio Tension Hormone technique in episode 441, fans theorized about the cumulative effects on Luffy's lifespan. Given that Luffy receives this treatment multiple times during the Impel Down and Marineford arcs, theories emerged that Luffy's lifespan has been significantly reduced, potentially affecting his ability to achieve his dream or setting up a tragic element to his story.
author: One Piece Community Discussion
notes: This theory remains relevant as Luffy continues to push his body beyond its limits throughout the series. The actual impact on his lifespan has not been quantified in the canon.

title: Ivankov's Knowledge of Luffy's Mother
theoryText: Given Ivankov's close relationship with Dragon as revealed in episode 441, fans theorized that Ivankov might know the identity of Luffy's mother. Some speculated that Ivankov's emotional reaction to learning Luffy is Dragon's son might stem from knowledge about Luffy's mother and her fate.
author: One Piece Community Discussion
notes: This theory remains unconfirmed. The identity of Luffy's mother is one of the enduring mysteries in One Piece.
